sentence: In the Swahili and Indonesian culture, many of his stories are being told under the name of Abunuwasi or Abunawas, though this confuses Nasreddin with an entirely different man - the poet Abu Nuwas, known for homoerotic verse.

positive_examples.sentence: ...one of the best science fiction short stories of the pre nebula...
